subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade, Kobe Bryant and six others from the United States’ 2008 Olympic champions were among 27 players chosen for the national team roster.
snippet: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade, Kobe Bryant and six others from the United States’ 2008 Olympic champions were among 27 players chosen for the national team roster.
